trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANARK115_04565_SEQ_00<tab>Maru has a mitey problem for you.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANARK115_04565_TODO_00<tab>Survey the area from the designated location and defeat the starmites that appear.
TEXT_BANARK115_04565_MARU_000_001<tab>You know what a starmite is, right? Those hulkin' bugs? Well, they're on my blacklist now!
TEXT_BANARK115_04565_MARU_000_002<tab>I got chased by one the other day over by the old Hamsa Hatchery. My hippo startled so badly, I thought for sure I was goin' overboard...

TEXT_BANARK115_04565_MARU_000_003<tab>The starmites themselves ain't as dangerous as the fear they instill in our poor hippos, but a hazard's a hazard. Think you could lend us your hand of judgment an' cull the buggers?
TEXT_BANARK115_04565_MARU_000_004<tab>You remember those starmites you squashed? Well...they're bein' avenged.
TEXT_BANARK115_04565_MARU_000_005<tab>It's hard to tell what's more shaken─our sweet hippos' hearts or our cargo. Either way, all that's waitin' for us on those roads is bugs an' sorrow...
TEXT_BANARK115_04565_MARU_000_006<tab>You've gotta help us, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Head back over to the Perfumed Rise an' reunite those starmites with their maker...
TEXT_BANARK115_04565_MARU_000_020<tab>You're a savior, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! We can ride easy now, knowin' there are fewer starmites on the roads...
TEXT_BANARK115_04565_MARU_000_021<tab>Bein' chased is bad enough, but if we were to hit one at any speed, the cart would be wrecked an' the darlin' hippo injured─if not worse.
TEXT_BANARK115_04565_MARU_000_022<tab>Safe ridin's no trivial thing, so I might ask for your help smashin' starmites again sometime. Thanks for always lookin' out for us.
